extendedInfo.description: The United States Marine Corps.  Are you ready to know how to fight the way the Marines are taught?  Then this pocket sized android resource is for you.  An electronic version of the Close Combat Manual used to teach our fighting Marines how to take down the enemy in all situations.Includes MANY Photos and Drawings to see exactly how to do things correctly.- Super Easy navigation with Chapters and  Subchapters.- Each Chapter includes too many Photos to count!!- 8 Chapters of Close Combat Fighting Techniques.- 2 Appendices of Extra Information.- Each Page contains it's own Navigation.Chapter 1-Fundamentals of Close CombatChapter 2-Lethal and Nonlethal Weapons TechniquesChapter 3-Hand-Held WeaponsChapter 4-StrikesChapter 5-ThrowsChapter 6-Chokes and HoldsChapter 7-Ground FightingChapter 8-Nonlethal TechniquesAppendices - A & BRegardless if you are in the Marines or not, this Close Combat Guide is a Fantastic Resource.  KW: Army, Navy, Special Forces, Marines, Air Force, Warrior, Fight, Kill, Ninja, Military, Bayonet, Knife, Weapon, Gun, M-16, M-60, Drill, Practice, Examples, book, Guide, Camping, Guide, Knot, Tying

reviews.comment: Awesome app good to read and refresh your memory
reviews.author: A Google User
